name: Dragon Simulator
overview: Dragon simulator is a freeware flight sim with a difference. It uses graphics like Wing Commander to present a one to one duel between two dragons, one being computer control. There are 20 levels to play and it gets more difficult with each one. You opponent will grow faster, and more maneuverable. The evil wizard Mangoth has ruled the black forest for centuries. This has caused great suffering for those who dwell on the edge of the woods. You were sent to kill him, caught and turned into one of his dragon-slaves. Now you must fight the 20 dragons of the wizard or they will kill you and destroy your village.
